sense.def:
A petition
je dokument, ki ga je podpisalo veliko ljudi in ki zahteva določene uradne ukrepe.

seg.quote: He presented a petition signed by 10,357 electors.

sense.def:
A petition
je tudi prošnja sodišču, naj uvede določen pravni ukrep;

seg.quote: She has filed a petition for divorce.
It is my duty to petition the court to declare this action illegal.
